title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 595.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 595.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part
applies to any provider of services which operates or proposes to operate a
residential program for persons with mental illness and is licensed pursuant to
article 31 of the Mental Hygiene Law, including the Community Residence for

Eating Disorder Integrated Treatment ("CREDIT") Program. (b) This Part does not apply to any provider
of services which operates or proposes to operate a residential program for
children or adolescents with serious emotional disturbances. (c) This Part does not apply to family care
homes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
595.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
